description:
Länder (foreign trade)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
Foreign trade statistics also provide regional results in a
breakdown by Land. As for exports, the region of origin is
the Land where the commodity was entirely obtained or
produced or where it was last substantially treated or
processed in economically justified terms. Regarding
imports, the region of destination is the Land where the
arriving goods are expected to remain.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Länder (foreign trade)
